item.description:
THIS EVENT IS STILL ON!!!! COME EARLY before the rain comes this afternoon.

Fun in the Sun and Shade at Hopkinton State Park (we'll be in the shade)!!!

Menu update. We still need items listed in red below.

Two people per item to bring enough to serve 5-10 people each.
Please write in the comments section of your RSVP what you will be bringing so that everyone can see what is needed.

[b]Here is the update of who's bringing what.

Menu Items
Hamburgers - Michael and Nancy
Cheese for burgers - Jacki
Hot Dogs - Micki, Robin, and Donna
Potato - still need one or two people to bring potato salad
Pasta Salad - Ann Marie Mertz
Pickles - Roger
Mustard - Roger
Ketchup Roger
Chips - Robin and Donna
Fruit Salad - Laurie - still need one person to bring fruit salad or fruit
Hamburger Buns - Jacki and Nancy
Hotdog Buns - Jacki
Dessert - Laurie, Siobhan and Carol
Coal for the grille - Paul
Paper plates and Paper Cups - Andrea Cheryl
Forks, Grilling Utensils, and Napkins - Jacki
Cooler - still needed
Bags of Ice - One bag - Siobhan
Bottled Water - Jacki

Beverages: I mentioned that everyone bring their own beverages (no alcohol) but if someone wants to bring drinks, that is fine.

[b]I'll be there at 8:30 am - Please join me and help me reserve our location
Please note there is a $5 parking fee unless you have a Mass State Park Season Pass.

Boating
You can rent a kayak, canoe, sail boat, pedal boat etc. Click here for hourly rates.
http://www.outdoorrec...

Bring
Swimsuit (there are bathrooms for changing nearby)
Towel
Chair (there will also be picnic tables there)
Your Own beverages (no alcohol allowed)
One food item from the list above

Location: 268 Cedar Street (Route 85) Hopkinton (near Carbones)
For directions to the Park and more info:
Park Website:

How to Find Us
Enter the park and follow signs to Boat Rental (first right). Pass the boat rental on your right, continue to the end of the parking lot where the dumpsters are. Park and walk through the path by the dumpsters towards the beach. We will be on the left side right before the beach begins.


Weather Update
Rain is not expected until late Saturday, so this event is still on!
item.name: Boat, Beach, and BBQ (Fun & Relaxation at Hopkinton State Park)
